text: @pulte I wonder if you would consider buying medical equipment such as ventilators, masks, and gowns to help Governor Cuomo, Governor Newsom and other states that have been the hardest hit by the coronavirus? 🙋‍♀️This would be an excellent example of using social media for Good! Thank you
